About me

Yonghyun Chung is a research associate at Inha University in South Korea.



Eduction

  • PhD in Geophysics (2011) Supervisor: Changsoo Shin Seoul National University
  • MsD in Geophysics (1998) Supervisor: JungHee Suh Seoul National University
  • BS in Mineral and Petroleum Engineering (1996) Seoul National University


Research Area:

  • Inverse Scattering
  • Computational Geophysics
